mapper.select: select boardnum, memberid, title from market_board where soldout = 'N' order by boardnum desc
mapper.insert: insert into market_board (boardnum , memberid , title , contents) values (market_board_seq.nextval , #{memberid} , #{title} , #{contents})
mapper.select: select * from market_reply order by inputdate
mapper.insert: insert into market_reply(replynum, boardnum, memberid, replytext) values (market_reply_seq.nextval, #{boardnum}, #{memberid}, #{replytext})
